summary:
Adds 3 versions of Thor's Hammer to the game. Update 3 out now!

[b]Changelog:[/b]
- old model: fixed a few shader/texture seam issues
- craftable at forge, now MISC category
- added new models, 1h and 2h
- each model comes in 3 variations (enchanted, calm, normal)
descriptionHtml:
[center]I've quit modding and moved on to social work and game programming.
As a final gift: [b] ALL MY ASSETS ARE FREE TO USE[/b]
For further details and constraints, please check out the board thread:
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1779275-time-to-say-good-bye-and-a-little-gift/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1779275-time-to-say-good-bye-and-a-little-gift[/url]
Cheerio and keep on playing![/center]

[b]UPDATE 3:[/b]


[youtube]xNls5UEhXOM[/youtube]


[img]http://666kb.com/i/civxsbsdhcdejmmip.png[/img]


[b]Changelog:[/b]
- old model: fixed a few shader/texture seam issues
- craftable at forge, now MISC category
- added new models, 1h and 2h
- each model comes in 3 variations (enchanted, calm, normal)

Mjolnir V1 = old model 1h
Mjolnir V2 = new model 1h
Mjolnir V3 = new model 2h

enchanted = enchantment + increased knockback chance + shockwave effect/sound
calm = enchantment + reduced knockback chance
normal = no enchantment at all

[b]Check out my Weapon Pack: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28545//?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28545//?[/url][/b]



[b]Installation:[/b]

Copy textures and meshes folder & Thor.esp to your Skyrim data directory.

The folder-structure should look like:
... Skyrim data textures weapons Thor ALL DDS FILES
... Skyrim data meshes weapons Thor ALL NIF FILES
... Skyrim data THOR.ESP

Make sure that the plugin is activated in startmenu | DATA FILES.
The hammer is placed in the forge-menu along with MISC items.

If you want to add it using the console (key ^), enter:
help "Mjolnir"
remember the displayed code and enter:
player.additem CODE 1
"1" = amount

To uninstall the mod just delete the extracted files.

[b]THIS IS ONE OF MY OLDER MODS, BACK THEN MY MODDING SKILLS WERE NOT PERFECT - LIKE THIS MOD.
CURRENTLY I'M MAINTAINING MY NEW MODS - NO MORE HUGE UPDATES/FIXES ON THIS ONE PLANNED![/b]

Kudos to Wodenswolf for permission to use his photos for the handle texture of the old V1 model, check out his great gallery: http://wodenswolf.deviantart.com

Thx & have fun!



Looking for new weapons?
Check out my Weapon Pack featuring 18 weapons in 32 variations and a shield.

[img]http://666kb.com/i/c9xcxywq4r7bwn4gi.png[/img]

LINK: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28545//?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28545//?[/url]

[b]Looking for new helmets, a Bone Shield or new staffs?[/b]
Check out my Helmet Mod featuring over a dozen new helmets and more:

[img]http://666kb.com/i/cjcfllho4k90tm6vk.png[/img]
LINK: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43293]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43293[/url]

... and my other mod featuring muskets, blunderbuss and even a grenade launcher:
[img]http://666kb.com/i/c8u1v8s2in5lxaypd.png[/img]
LINK: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26653/?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26653/?[/url]
